title: Mind Body Connection | Chiropractor in Troy, OH | Stouder Chiropractic
description: Mind Body Connection in Troy, OH. Stouder Chiropractic is your local Chiropractor in Troy serving all of your needs. Call us today at (937) 335-8534 for an appointment.
cleaned_text: Whether we're driving a car, riding a bike, or trying to record a spare at our local bowling alley, our musculoskeletal system bases its decision-making on past history, that is, what it has learned before.
